pr_title: lib/url.dl: Library for working with URLs.

timeline.message:
lib/url.dl: Library for working with URLs.

DDlog bindings for the `url` crate.

+/* Parse an absolute URL from a string. */
+extern function url_parse(url: string): Result<Url, string>

I wonder whether we could generate some of this code automatically from the dl declarations.
Perhaps we could have an annotations for the ones where we can.
